channel.title: Please help! server under attack!
channel.description: Ok i just shut off server because im getting syied only every time the server bans him he just comes back. I cant even delite his character profile in my character folder when i click delite nothing happens. I tried ip banning him but his name like 2r434t45h45h45h45h54h45h45h45h45h and and and on.... i any suggestions please..!

im ALWAYS online since i have yim on my blackberry…

@o.O_O.o wrote:

That just avoids that specific nuller who doesn’t pay attention. What you must do is check for nulls, and automatically kick them, along with only allowing one login per IP address.

item.title: Please help! server under attack!
item.dc:creator: @Power_For_It Power For It
item.description:
@Power_For_It wrote:

Thats why you gotta have a good source with anti-dupe anti-syi anti-null everything and if you dont have it code it in because if u get nulled on ur server. Your computer will suffer CRAZY lag!!! And you need a server with 100% working ::ipban and ::ban no errors, if you don’t have that you gotta code it OR u cud go into character files find one spammer file search in its file for the ip and head to ur ipbans java file and insert there IP adresss in there. DONT BE CONFUSED it will probably be something like “comcast.net0239009320932093290” or “rogers.88.233.233.900”

Read full topic
